lines.text: Mr. Frog, I am ashamed for you to hire me.
Yeah, you told me you was the best cook in Mexico.
Oh, si! But I am on the wrong side of the border.
Don't give me the salute, give me the news!
I'm sorry, Pancho. I don't find out anything.
Oh, you big disappointment. You don't find nothing? The next time there's nothing to be done, I do it myself.
Girls are all right, but look at that! Give me a beautiful steak anytime!
